title: Why bomb Sokoto? Trump’s strikes baffle Nigerians
description: US missile attacks on Christmas Day hit a part of Nigeria’s north-west that is almost entirely Muslim
content: US missile attacks on Christmas Day hit a part of Nigeria’s north-west that is almost entirely Muslim
